alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Camden; Gloucester (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:50PM EDT until July 25 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR CAMDEN...EAST CENTRAL GLOUCESTER AND WEST CENTRAL BURLINGTON COUNTIES... At 450 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Berlin, or 11 miles southeast of Gloucester City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Evesham, Voorhees, Lindenwold, Hammonton, Berlin, Magnolia, Chesilhurst, Sicklerville, Echelon, Atco, Williamstown, Marlton Lakes, Turnersville, Springdale, Ashland, Pine Hill, Runnemede, Stratford, Barrington and Somerdale. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 32 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
